item.title: Books
item.description: 2011-03-20 » Book: Confessions of a Public Speaker by Scott Berkun Excellent. A must-read if you want to improve your public speaking. 2011-01-05 » Book: Leading Lean Software Development by Mary and Tom Poppendieck Insightful, clear and thought-provoking; though not a comprehensive hands-on guide. 2011-02-06 » Book: Talent is Overrated by Geoff Colvin Fascinating and important. How top performers really get to be so great. Don't let a false notion of innate talent stop you.
